collection.name: Snake Plant, Spider Plant, Peace Lily, ZZ Plant, Baby Rubber Plant

care.designTip: For a more bold statement garden. snake plant. spider plant. peace lilies. zz plants. and baby rubber plants create a beautiful yet wild look for your space

collection.name: Philodendron Brasil, Philodendron Micans, Heartleaf Philodendron, Polka Dot Plant, Boston Fern

care.designTip: For an understated and elegant touch to your house philodendron brasil. philodendron micans. Heartleaf Philodendron. Polka Dot Plant. and boston ferns create a serene yet elevated atmosphere for all to enjoy

collection.name: Lucky Bamboo, Dwarf Bamboo, Boston Fern, Peace Lily, Anthurium

care.designTip: Bring a touch of the jungle to your living sapce that will surely wow your guests with lucky bamboo. dwarf bamboo. boston ferns. peace lilies. and anthuriums

collection.name: Purple Shamrock, Haworthia, Peperomia Watermelon, Orchid, Jade Plant

care.designTip: For a living space fit for a monarch purple shamrock. haworthia. peperomia watermelon. jade plants. and orchids will bloom with vibrant royal purples that will be sure to catch any eye

collection.name: Echeveria, Aloe Vera, Sedum, jade plant, String of Pearls

care.designTip: For a space with a pop of color. echeveria. aloe vera. string of pearls. and sedum will bring an array of striking cool toned hues to your day to day life

collection.name: ZZ Plant, Peace Lilly, Snake Plant, Parlor Palm, Chinese Evergreen

care.designTip: For the more traditional gardener. zz plant. peace lilies. parlor palm. chinese evergreen. and snake plants bring cozy green hues indoors with a touch of fun through their unique leaves and blossoms

collection.name: Philodendron Hope, Philodendron Micans, Money Tree, Fiddle Leaf Fig, Calathea Medallion

care.designTip: Place the taller Fiddle Leaf Fig and Money Tree at the back. with the medium-sized Philodendron Hope and Calathea Medallion in the middle. and the trailing Philodendron Micans in front

collection.name: Orchid, Philodendron Xanadu, Hoya, Snake Plant, Spider Plant

care.designTip: For a more minimalistic approach. orchids. philodendron xanadu. snake plant. spider plant. and hoya plants create a nice pop of color that will not overpower your living space

collection.name: Anthurium, Boston Fern, Dwarf Bamboo, Peace Lily, Bird's Nest Fern

care.designTip: For the maximalist with a green thumb. anthuriums. boston ferns. peace lily. birds nest fern. and dwarf bamboo are sure not to be outshined by a daring living space and will bring their own energy to your home

collection.name: Aloe Vera, Echeveria, Jade Plant, Sedum, Ponytail Palm

care.designTip: For the succulent loving home. aloe vera. echeveria. jade plants. ponytail palm. and sedum bring lots of variety of color while still maintaining the manageable size of the succulent family

collection.name: Mini Monstera, Money Tree, Heavenly Bamboo, Fiddle Leaf Fig, Philodendron Hope

care.designTip: For larger spaces with lots of personality. mini monstera. money trees. heavenly bamboo. and philodendron hope are great space fillers with subtle pops of color that will be sure to bring larger living spaces a more intimate feel

collection.image: "plant_images/Mini Monstera.png", "plant_images/Money Tree.png", "plant_images/Heavenly Bamboo.png", "plant_images/Fiddle Leaf Fig.png", "plant_images/Philodendron Hope.png"

collection.name: Bird of Paradise, Rubber Plant, Monstera, Corn Plant, Dragon Tree

care.designTip: For the more bohemian style home. bird of paradise. rubber plants. monstera. corn plants. and dragons trees bring a wide variety of foliage to the home that is sure to make your space feel more serene

collection.name: Jade Plant, Yucca Elephantipes, Hoya, Philodendron Xanadu, Corn Plant

care.designTip: This unique garden set brings together the succulent charm of the Jade Plant. the bold stature of Yucca Elephantipes. the waxy cascading vines of Hoya. and the lush. textured leaves of Philodendron Xanadu for a captivating and diverse display of greenery

collection.name: Black Bamboo, Golden Bamboo, Heavenly Bamboo, Elephant Ear, Majesty Palm

care.designTip: Create a tropical oasis by arranging taller plants like Majesty Palm and Elephant Ear at the back. with Black Bamboo. Golden Bamboo. and Heavenly Bamboo layered in front for depth and texture

collection.name: Pothos, Snake Plant, Cast Iron Plant, Weeping Fig, Dumb Cane

care.designTip: Create a lush. layered look by placing the taller Weeping Fig and Dumb Cane at the back. the medium-height Cast Iron Plant and Snake Plant in the middle. and the trailing Pothos at the front or in a hanging planter for added dimension
